item.title: Pork Belly Roast
item.description: In kind of an homage to Denmark, I will share a recipe my favorite danish dish. You can find it in the prepared food section in the supermarkets all year long, but it's also a traditional Christmas dish. I used a Jamie Oliver recipe) which I think is pretty similar to the ones you can find here in Denmark. Ingredients (6 servings) 1,5kg (3.5 pounds) pork belly 2 onions 2 carrots 2 celery sticks 1 bulb of garlic salt, pepper, q.
